verbose_text: Our finding that Hs6st1 facilitates Fgf8 signalling while repressing Fgf8 levels suggests the hypothesis that Hs6st1 mediated affinity of Fgf8 for the cell surface promotes both clearance by RME and signalling activity, possibly also hindering diffusion, through the common mechanism of stabilising Fgf8 : Fgfr1 : HS complex formation.
